Html:
hi folks,

 

i hope someone can help me with the following problem.

i want to simulate an voice-over ip software.

for that reason i need to find a way to stream some audio-file automaticly into the audio-in of my laptop.

is this possible with NAudio or does anyone have further suggestions?

 

thanks a lot,

ben

there is an example of voice chat using UDP in NAudioDemo. If you want to make something like Skype though there is a lot more work involved.

Faking an audio-input is unfortunately very difficult in Windows. You need a virtual audio device driver to do it.

Mark
